alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo; Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 15 at 1:03PM CST until January 16 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 degrees. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 above zero. * WHERE...Portions of Deep South Texas. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from midnight tonight to 3 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
